post.text: "The fear of nuclear war that we had as children, I never thought our children would ever have to deal with that again."

comment.author: Kristen
comment.text: Trump is dangerous and so obviously unqualified as president and commander-in-chief for a futureoriented, liberal, motivated and democratic USA .. For US citizens it's just time to vote for Hillary Clinton and the democrats ..

replies.author: Christopher
replies.text: DEMAND she step aside. This country cannot afford another Clinton SCANDAL. Idiot Hillary brought down by a Pedophile.

replies.author: Kristen
replies.text: The country cannot afford a huge Trump scandal .. it cannot afford to be shaped by rasicm and hate .. Trump is a dishonest demagogue .. Look at his face and listen carefully to his words ..
